page.title: 04"Home Farm Trust" Frocester.
page.content: The Home Farm Trust is at Frocester Manor.It is a Charity for the mentally handicapped, being founded in 1962 by parents, and provides a home and work for life for its residents. The Manor House is 160yrs.old and is set in 18acres of grounds,mainly grass with orchard,farm,garden and parkland. The house has been extended to provide for 35 residents of age 22-54yrs.There are 13 ladies and 22 men plus 3 non residents who come in daily from home. There are 6 outdoor,12 indoor and 4 night staff plus the resident manager. The Trust was created to make a home, providing reassurance and training,for mentally handicapped adults.The Home's success in "Care for Life"and the need for places has led to the opening of 8 other homes throughout the country providing 228 places in all.The Parent Staff Associations support each home.
